name: LiquidFileUploader
description: Build task, for help you uploasd files to liquide file server
author: AviHadad
instanceNameFormat: Upload files from folder to LiquidFile

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: liquidfile server url
inputs.helpMarkDown: a full url to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Token in Base64 (converter - https://www.base64encode.org/)
inputs.helpMarkDown: a base64 token for your liquidefile server (BASIC ************) - use a secret

inputs.name: days
inputs.label: Expire gap
inputs.helpMarkDown: a days number for your liquidefile server as expire gap

inputs.name: folder
inputs.label: Upload folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: the folder that contains the files to upload to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: private
inputs.label: Download Permmision
inputs.helpMarkDown: appliese permmision dowload parameter to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: pool
inputs.label: Pool name
inputs.helpMarkDown: pool id in liquidfile witch the files will be add to

inputs.name: email
inputs.label: Target email
inputs.helpMarkDown: email witch the server send the download links to

inputs.name: group
inputs.label: Grouped mail
inputs.helpMarkDown: Groups all files in folder into one mail.

inputs.name: dell
inputs.label: Delete Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: if you want to delete the files from the folder.

inputs.name: auth
inputs.label: Require Auth
inputs.helpMarkDown: if he need to Authenticate befor downloading.
